chimist.name: Chemist
chimist.description: Job that pays you according to your popularity
chimist.disadvantages: Can cause disease, or even death, which will cause the end by dying, and a chance / 2 to die with the disease.
chimist.benefits: You can be recognized in the world for your potions and others and earn more money, ranging from 100 to 10000$.

clown.name: Clown
clown.description: Job that pays you according to the birthdays celebrated
clown.disadvantages: When you have a birthday party, parents have a 50/50 chance of firing you because you scare 8 year olds
clown.benefits: When you make people laugh, they will surely give you coins at the end of your shows.

plumber.name: Plumber
plumber.description: Repairing pipes in people's homes, the people who screwed you could sue if you do this job wrong.

banker.name: Banker
banker.cautions: You take `20%` of the members' loans
banker.disadvantages: You can die if a serial killer robs your bank.
